price: “None imvugo ya Nyagasani wacu idusohoreyeho ko tugomba kumva ububabare bw’ibihano.”
arabic: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّنَآۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: faḥaqqa ʿalaynā qawlu rabbinā innā ladhāiqūna
